channel.title: Menus on Error States
channel.description: Recent content in Menus on Error States

item.title: 015 - The Building Glitches
item.description: Spotted in St. Louis, Missouri. The entire building - a fancy hotel? - was decked out in display panels. An architectural gimmick I’ve been noticing more and more, especially to ensure a building stands out at night. But these screens go bad just like every other technology. [Continue Reading]

item.title: 014 - The Future of Fast Food, Part 2
item.description: Spotted in a Taco Bell in Arizona. Two error states, side by side. [Continue Reading]

item.title: 013 - The Future of Fast Food
item.description: Spotted in a Plant Power in Riverside, California. But the innovations don’t stop there. [Continue Reading]
